frontmatter.title: Big Data Message System
frontmatter.description: This post introduces a framework for a message system for big data built with Kafka+Flink+ElasticSearch and how do these tools work behind the scene.

frontmatter.title: A Fault-Tolerant Distributed System with Raft
frontmatter.description: This post lays down the motivations and challenges for distributed systems and introduces an approach to fault-tolerant distributed systems using Raft.
